snippet: A van Gogh that normally resides at the Norton Simon Museum in California, “Portrait of a Peasant (Patience Escalier),” is taking a vacation at the Frick Collection.
abstract: Karen Rosenberg reviews Vincent van Gogh's Portrait of a Peasant at The Frick Collection.
lead_paragraph: A van Gogh that normally resides at the Norton Simon Museum in California, “Portrait of a Peasant (Patience Escalier),” is taking a vacation at the Frick Collection.

headline.seo: VINCENT VAN GOGH’S ‘PORTRAIT OF A PEASANT (PATIENCE ESCALIER)’
headline.main: Vincent van Gogh’s “Portrait of a Peasant (Patience Escalier)”
headline.print_headline: Vincent van Gogh’s “Portrait of a Peasant (Patience Escalier)”
